about_the_game:
Settle the islands of the Mare Nostrum in the brand new DLC for Patron! New maps, buildings, resources and production chains are waiting for you to include them in your successful colony on the Mediterranean.

DLC includes:
  • 2 new maps
  • new biome (Mediterranean)
  • 7 new production buildings: Marble quarry, Cheese store, Saltworks, Smokehouse, Jam factory, Sugar mill, Irrigation well
  • build the Theatre to entertain and educate your citizens
  • 9 new resources: Sugarcane, Sugar, Olives, Marble, Cheese, Prosciutto, Jam, Rum, Salt
  • 5 new professions
  • new domestic animals, field crops and orchard trees
  • existing resources connected in more production chains

  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 3 GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 560 4 GB
